newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Fischer challenges Australia Opposition over shares.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Fischer challenges Australia Opposition over shares.

text.p: Australian Deputy Prime Minister Tim Fischer said on Wednesday he challenged the Labor opposition to attack his integrity in parliament.
"I'll be very happy to deal with this where it should be dealt with," Fischer told reporters.
"I challenge Labor to attack my integrity on the floor of the house (of representatives). It will backfire on them. I will meet them head on and that's the appropriate place."
The government has lost two members this week over conflicts of interests regarding share ownership and a newspaper reported on Wednesday that Fischer might also have breached guidelines.
